result.reason: Fullscreen RDP connections use understated resolution, likely due to incorrect screen bounds calculation that doesn't account for taskbar or DPI scaling when setting DesktopWidth/DesktopHeight on the RDP ActiveX control.
result.approach: In the fullscreen resolution setup, use Screen.FromControl or SystemInformation.VirtualScreen bounds instead of ClientSize or working area; ensure DPI scaling is applied correctly before passing DesktopWidth/DesktopHeight to AxMsRdpClient.
